page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SALLY
page.content: { {A Day In The Life Of Sally King On Saturday I begin the day by taking the dog for a walk and then go jogging.I come home and put my jodpurs and all of my riding gear and set off for Greenloaning Riding School. This starts at 10.30am. When I get there I go into the office and check which horse I'm on then run to the horse's stable and help tack the horse up. When my lesson is over I help in the stable until Dad collects me. We have lunch together which is always chicken soup,and then I go outside to play because my Mummy is a night nurse and so sleeps all day and if you wake her up your in big trouble. Daddy makes the tea and afterwards I lie in front of the television with my dog, Bentley,and later struggle up the stairs to bed,exhausted.
